description.value:
Your connection to this divine domain ensures you always have certain spells ready. When you reach a Cleric level specified in the Trickery Domain Spells table, you thereafter always have the listed spells prepared.

Trickery Domain Spells
Cleric LevelSpells
3rd@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplCharmPerso]{Charm Person}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplDisguiseSe]{Disguise Self}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplInvisibili]{Invisibility}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplPassWithou]{Pass without Trace}
5th@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplHypnoticPa]{Hypnotic Pattern}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplNondetecti]{Nondetection}
7th@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplConfusion0]{Confusion}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplDimensionD]{Dimension Door}
9th@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplDominatePe]{Dominate Person}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplModifyMemo]{Modify Memory}
